Recipe.title: Ginger Carrots
Recipe.Description: Nobody in Ransom's family likes sweet potatoes, or yams. This slightly sweet recipe takes their place at Thanksgiving.

section.instruction: Peel Carrots and cut into 1&inch; chunks.
Pull all ingredients into a saucepan.
Place on stove and heat on high until it is boiling.
Reduce heat to medium/medium low and simmer until carrots are soft.

Modifications.modification: You can create the Double-Strength Chicken Broth by using 2 Cups Water + 4 Chicken Bouillon Cubes (or the equivalent).
For a little kick, add ½ teaspoon White Pepper.
